name: Suspicious Rice Buns
desc: Soft and fluffy buns. The dough has not been proofed properly, meaning the buns did not puff up evenly during the steaming process. The resulting coarse, hard texture leaves much to be desired.

value.text: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Rice Buns
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Rice Buns.

customize.name: Rice
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Horsetail
customize.desc: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper â€” like an aristocrat among the paupers.

customize.name: Rice Buns
customize.desc: Soft and fluffy buns. The rice and horsetail have been ground into flour and kneaded into dough before being placed into a steaming basket. They can be eaten as-is or with a vegetable filling. Portable and satiating, it is a very popular dish in the Liyue region.

customize.name: Delicious Rice Buns
customize.desc: Soft and fluffy buns. The unique sweetness of the whole grains passes between your teeth and lips as you chew. The relatively nondescript ingredients have been transformed into a true delicacy by your labors. This is one of the simple pleasures of the common folk and tastes best after some good, honest work.
